Related Functions

typedef Vector3 Colour3
 A colour contain three values, red, green and blue.

Detailed Description

Structure to hold a vector contain three values.

Used to define interaction in 3D, and used to represent a colour with no alpha (r,g,b)

Todo:
add GetColour to read colour in 0-255 form

const Vector3 & chain::Vector3::Truncate ( Real  s  ) 

Truncate this vector.

similar to Scale(), but only scales vector to s if it's length is greater than s

Parameters:
s - limiting length
Returns:
const Vector3& - the new vector
See also:

Member Data Documentation

union { ... }

Real chain::Vector3::b

Colour data interface.

Blue value of vector, equal to Vector3::z

Real chain::Vector3::g

Colour data interface.

Green value of vector, equal to Vector3::y

Real chain::Vector3::m_data[3]

Array data interface.

Array to access all three values

Real chain::Vector3::r

Colour data interface.

Red value of vector, equal to Vector3::x
